name: AUDSDG
description:
It has been years since the virus revenged the land reducing most to mindless husks. It has been years since the cult appeared to destroy that which remained. It has been years since the virus mutated make the mindless husks no longer mindless.

Play with up to 15 other players split into three different groups. Play as the survivors who try to survive the attacks brought on by the cult and undead. Play as the cult who plan to destroy what little remains of humanity. Play as the undead who plan to bring about Humanities forced evolution.

The Survivors

The Survivors while weak by themselves out number the other groups. Their abilities revolve around defense and the gathering of information. They can vote out anyone who they believe to be evil.

The Cult

The Cult Are Strong individually who plan to destroy all life that remains. Their abilities revolve around aggression and destroying information. They can kill anyone that disagrees with their goals.

The Undead

The Undead weak by itself must keep hidden to stay alive. Their abilities revolve around staying alive. They can convert other players both living and dead to their side.
